data.title: Alexandre Pato goes on holiday with girlfriend Fiorella Mattheis as Brazil striker gets over Chelsea snub under boss Antonio Conte
meta_keywords: Alexandre Pato Fiorella Mattheis Brazil Chelsea Antonio Conte
data.meta_description: Alexandre Pato goes on holiday with girlfriend Fiorella Mattheis as Brazil striker gets over Chelsea snub under boss Antonio Conte
data.text:
ALEXANDRE PATO has decided to get over his Chelsea blues with a by jetting off to the Caribbean with his model girlfriend.

Just days ago the Brazilian forward reportedly discovered that incoming Chelsea boss Antonio Conte has decided against signing him permanently from Corinthians.

Pato was able to find the time to sun himself after being overlooked by Brazil boss Carlos Dunga for the Copa America in the US.

The 26-year-old former AC Milan striker was brought to Stamford Bridge in January by Blues’ former interim coach Guus Hiddink.

And he made just one start and one substitute appearance, in which he scored from the penalty spot against Aston Villa as he struggled to adjust to life in England.

His girlfriend Mattheis kept a video diary of their life together in West London as they sat on the sidelines.

The actress and model uploaded a four-and-a-half-minute video of her time in the capital entitled ‘See U In London’.

The riveting YouTube clip shows her travelling business class on a plane before heading for a trip on the London Eye, with day-to-day activities like going shopping and filling the car up with petrol also shown in the riveting video.

Pato, 26, has fallen out of the public eye since his low-key move to the Brazil side in 2013.

But he has kept up appearances through social media with the couple regularly posting updates.

Here are a couple of the most recent…
